title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: I need someone from Turkey, need to talk to him about a business opportunity.

comments.author: emre06060
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on June 17, 2023, 03:15:28 PMI need someone from Turkey, need to talk to him about a business opportunity.Send me message from dm.

comments.author: forceoffog
comments.body: Hello , if you need to ask something you can write me i try to answer you.

comments.author: winston00
comments.body: Hello, you can write me via DM.

comments.author: adonis19
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on June 17, 2023, 03:15:28 PMI need someone from Turkey, need to talk to him about a business opportunity.Hello, I own a company that operates in areas such as cryptocurrency research, consultancy, and active nodes of many cryptocurrencies. I also manage the company. If you have any questions or concerns regarding legal matters, feel free to send me a private message, and I'll be happy to assist you.
